name: Stay Away'k
description:
In Stay Away'k, you play as a child trying to survive the attacks of your worst nightmares.

Controls:

AWDS - Walking

Left Shift - Sprinting

E - interact with objects

Screens:

How to play?

When Aunt is attacking you have to hide in the bed until she will go.

When Shadow is attacking you have to hide in the wardrobe for exactly 3 secounds.

When Pinguine is attacking you have simply to shut him.

Update BETA - 0.2.1:
